product_name: Planet Bike Superflash Stealth Rear Bike Light
long_description: Superflash Stealth(TM) is possibly the brightest bike taillight on the planet- it has a white lens with red lights! Half-watt Blaze(TM) LED and 2 Extreme(TM) red LEDs provide visibility up to one mile. Compact vertical design is weatherproof, lightweight and durable. Flashing and steady modes; unique, eye-catching flash pattern. Comes with bike mounts and clip mount. Batteries included.
short_description: Superflash Stealth(TM) is possibly the brightest bike taillight on the planet- it has a white lens with red lights!
